Verses: 1  naan Kiristhuvaip Pinpatrugiradhupola, Neengal Ennaip Pinpatrugiravargalaayirungal.
2  sagodharare, Neengal Ellaavatrilum Ennai Ninaiththukkondu, Naan Ungalukku Oppuviththapadi Neengal Kattalaigalaik Kaikkondu Varugiradhinimiththam Ungalaip Pugazhugiren.
3  ovvoru Purushanukkum Kiristhu Thalaiyaayirukkiraarendrum, Sthireekkup Purushan Thalaiyaayirukkiraanendrum, Kiristhuvukku Dhevan Thalaiyaayirukkiraarendrum, Neengal Ariyavendumendru Virumbugiren.
4  jebampannugirapodhaavadhu, Theerkkadharisananj Sollugirapodhaavadhu, Than Thalaiyai Moodikkondirukkira Endhap Purushanum Than Thalaiyaik Kanaveenappaduththugiraan.

5  jebampannugirapodhaavadhu, Theerkkadharisananj Sollugirapodhaavadhu, Than Thalaiyai Moodikkollaadhirukkira Endha Sthireeyum Than Thalaiyaik Kanaveenappaduththugiraal; Adhu Avalukkuth Thalai Siraikkappattadhupolirukkume.

6  sthireeyaanaval Mukkaadittukkollaavittaal Thalaimayiraiyum Kaththariththuppodakkadaval; Thalaimayir Kaththarikkappadugiradhum Siraikkappadugiradhum Sthireekku Vetkamaanaal Mukkaadittukkondirukkakkadaval.
7  purushanaanavan Dhevanudaiya Saayalum Magimaiyumaayirukkirapadiyaal, Than Thalaiyai Moodikkollavenduvadhillai; Sthireeyaanaval Purushanudaiya Magimaiyaayirukkiraal.
8  purushan Sthireeyilirundhu Thondrinavanalla, Sthireeye Purushanilirundhu Thondrinaval.
9  purushan Sthireekkaaga Sirushtikkappattavanalla, Sthireeye Purushanukkaaga Sirushtikkappattaval.
10  aagaiyaal Thoodhargalinimiththam Sthireeyaanaval Thalaiyinmel Mukkaadittukkollavendum.
11  aagilum Karththarukkul Sthireeyillaamal Purushanumillai, Purushanillaamal Sthireeyumillai.
12  sthireeyaanaval Purushanilirundhu Thondrugiradhupola, Purushanum Sthireeyinaal Thondrugiraan; Sagalamum Dhevanaal Undaayirukkiradhu.
13  sthireeyaanaval Dhevanai Nokki Jebampannugaiyil, Than Thalaiyai Moodikkollaamalirukkiradhu Ilatchanamaayirukkumo Endru Ungalukkulle Nidhaaniththukkollungal.
14  purushan Mayirai Neelamaai Valarkkiradhu Avanukku Kanaveenamaayirukkiradhendrum,
15  sthiree Than Mayirai Neelamaai Valarkkiradhu Avalukku Magimaiyaayirukkiradhendrum Subaavame Ungalukkup Podhikkiradhillaiyaa? Thalaimayir Avalukku Mukkaadaagak Kodukkappattirukkiradhe.
16  aagilum Oruvan Vaakkuvaadhanseyya Manadhaayirundhaal, Engalukkum, Dhevanudaiya Sabaigalukkum, Appadippatta Vazhakkamillaiyendru Ariyakkadavan.
17  ungalaip Pugazhaamal Idhaikkuriththu Ungalukkuk Kattalaikodukkiren; Neengal Koodivarudhal Nanmaikkedhuvaayiraamal, Theemaikkedhuvaayirukkiradhe.
18  mudhalaavadhu, Neengal Sabaiyile Koodivandhirukkumpodhu, Ungalil Pirivinaigal Undendru Kelvippadugiren, Adhil Silavatrai Nambugiren.
19  ungalil Uththamargal Innaarendru Veliyaagumpadikku Maarkkapedhangalum Ungalukkulle Undaayirukkavendiyadhe.
20  neengal Oridaththil Koodivarumpodhu, Avanavan Thanthan Sondha Pojanaththai Mundhi Saappidugiraan; Oruvan Pasiyaayirukkiraan, Oruvan Veriyaayirukkiraan.
21  ippadi Seygiradhu Karththarudaiya Iraappojanampannudhalallave.

22  pusikkiradharkum Kudikkiradharkum Ungalukku Veedugal Illaiyaa? Dhevanudaiya Sabaiyai Asattaipanni Illaadhavargalai Vetkappaduththugireergalaa? Ungalukku Naan Ennasolluven? Idhaikkuriththu Ungalaip Pugazhveno? Pugazhen.
23  naan Ungalukku Oppuviththadhaik Karththaridaththil Petrukkonden; Ennavenil,karththaraagiya Yesu Thaam Kaattikkodukkappatta Andru Iraaththiriyile Appaththai Eduththu,
24  sthoththirampanni, Adhaippittu: Neengal Vaangip Pusiyungal, Idhu Ungalukkaagap Pitkappadugira Ennudaiya Sareeramaayirukkiradhu; Ennai Ninaivukoorumpadi Idhai Seyyungal Endraar.

25  pojanampanninapinbu, Avar Andhappadiye Paaththiraththaiyum Eduththu: Indhap Paaththiram En Iraththaththinaalaagiya Pudhiya Udanpadikkaiyaayirukkiradhu; Neengal Idhaip Paanampannumpodhellaam Ennai Ninaivukoorumpadi Idhai Seyyungal Endraar.
26  aagaiyaal Neengal Indha Appaththaip Pusiththu, Indhap Paaththiraththil Paanampannumpodhellaam Karththar Varumalavum Avarudaiya Maranaththaith Therivikkireergal.

27  ippadiyirukka, Evan Apaaththiramaaik Karththarudaiya Appaththaip Pusiththu, Avarudaiya Paaththiraththil Paanampannugiraano, Avan Karththarudaiya Sareeraththaiyum Iraththaththaiyum Kuriththuk Kutramullavanaayiruppaan.
28  endha Manushanum Thannaiththaane Sodhiththarindhu, Indha Appaththil Pusiththu, Indhap Paaththiraththil Paanampannakkadavan.
29  ennaththinaalenil, Apaaththiramaaip Pojanapaanampannugiravan, Karththarudaiyasareeram Innadhendru Nidhaaniththu Ariyaadhadhinaal, Thanakku Aakkinaiththeerppu Varumpadi Pojanapaanampannugiraan.
30  idhinimiththam, Ungalil Anegar Balaveenarum Viyaadhiyullavargalumaayirukkiraargal; Anegar Niththiraiyum Adaindhirukkiraargal.
31  nammai Naame Nidhaaniththu Arindhaal Naam Niyaayandheerkkappadom.
32  naam Niyaayantheerkkappadumpodhu Ulagaththode Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkappadaadhapadikku, Karththaraale Sitchikkappadugirom.
33  aagaiyaal, En Sagodharare, Neengal Pojanampannak Koodivarumpodhu, Oruvarukkaaga Oruvar Kaaththirungal.
34  neengal Aakkinaikkedhuvaagak Koodivaraadhapadikku, Oruvanukkup Pasiyirundhaal Veettile Saappidakkadavan. Matrak Kaariyangalai Naan Varumpodhu Thittampannuven.
